Sacred Space.quote: "How awesome is this place! This is none other than the house of God, and this is the gate of heaven." (Genesis 28:17)

Temple.quote: "My house shall be called a house of prayer for all peoples." (Isaiah 56:7)

Sanctuary Definition.quote: "The Lord is in his holy temple; let all the earth keep silence before him." (Habakkuk 2:20)

Sacred Ground.quote: "Remove your sandals from your feet, for the place where you stand is holy ground." (Exodus 3:5)

Inner Sanctuary.quote: "Do you not know that you are God's temple and that God's Spirit dwells in you?" (1 Corinthians 3:16)

Divine Dwelling.quote: "Verily, the first House appointed for mankind was that at Bakkah (Mecca), full of blessing." (Quran 3:96)

Sacred Center.quote: "In the center of the soul is the divine milieu where the creature touches the Creator." (Meister Eckhart)

Holy Places.quote: "Wherever you turn, there is the Face of Allah." (Quran 2:115)

Sanctuary Purpose.quote: "Let them make me a sanctuary, that I may dwell in their midst." (Exodus 25:8)

Sacred Architecture.quote: "The temple is cosmic space in microcosm." (Mircea Eliade, The Sacred and the Profane)

Sanctuary Gates.quote: "This is the gate of the Lord; the righteous shall enter through it." (Psalm 118:20)

Divine Protection.quote: "The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run into it and are safe." (Proverbs 18:10)

Sacred Boundaries.quote: "I will be a wall of fire around her, and I will be the glory in her midst." (Zechariah 2:5)

Sanctuary Rules.quote: "Holiness befits your house, O Lord, forevermore." (Psalm 93:5)

Sacred Presence.quote: "The Pure Land is not far from here." (Buddha)

Divine Refuge.quote: "God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble." (Psalm 46:1)

Sacred Rituals.quote: "Worship the Lord in the beauty of holiness." (Psalm 29:2)

Sanctuary Peace.quote: "My soul yearns, even faints, for the courts of the Lord." (Psalm 84:2)

Sacred Vessels.quote: "The vessels of the sanctuary are holy." (Numbers 31:6)

Divine Access.quote: "Let us then with confidence draw near to the throne of grace." (Hebrews 4:16)

Sacred Time.quote: "For a day in your courts is better than a thousand elsewhere." (Psalm 84:10)

Sanctuary Service.quote: "They serve in a copy and shadow of the heavenly sanctuary." (Hebrews 8:5)

Sacred Community.quote: "For where two or three are gathered in my name, there am I among them." (Matthew 18:20)

Divine Environment.quote: "In sacred space, the ordinary becomes extraordinary." (Joseph Campbell)

Sanctuary Wisdom.quote: "The temple is a place of instruction, of revelation, of making covenants." (Dalai Lama)

Sacred Orientation.quote: "From the rising of the sun to its setting, my name is great among the nations." (Malachi 1:11)

Divine Atmosphere.quote: "The whole earth is full of His glory." (Isaiah 6:3)

Sanctuary Elements.quote: "Gold, and silver, and brass, and precious stones adorned the sanctuary." (Exodus 35:5)

Sacred Function.quote: "That they may make me a sanctuary wherein I may dwell among them." (Exodus 25:8)

Divine Order.quote: "Let all things be done decently and in order." (1 Corinthians 14:40)
